item.description:
Let's celebrate Brazilian Culture, Dance and Music! I went to this last year and it was a fun time. It's right by the Hartford Riverfront.

***THIS IS A FREE EVENT****

Here is a schedule of the events:
11:00-12:00: Summit Steel directed by Hallie Blejewski at the Plaza Entrance

12:00-12:30: Parade

12:30-1:00: Guakibom Jazz band on Plaza Stage

1:00-1:45: Samba Ensemble with special guest Jos√© Paulo

1:45-2:15: Artists Collective West African Dance and Drum Ensemble on Plaza Stage

2:15-2:45: Negrura Peruana on Plaza Stage

2:45-3:30: Ray Gonzalez y su Conjunto Antillano on River Stage

3:30-4:00: Ginga Brasileira Capoeira dance on Plaza Stage

4:00-4:30: Bomba Ashe on Plaza Stage

4:30-6:00: Berimbrown and Dinho Nascimento on River Stage

We will be coordinating this event with the Portuguese Speakers Meetup Group of Connecticut

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: SAMBA FEST!!!
